## Name and Recode Variables

-   [ ] Log into Qualtrics: <https://binghamton.co1.qualtrics.com>

    -   [ ] Under Active surveys, click on your survey

-   [ ] Recode variables in Qualtrics

    -   [ ] Visit "Recode Values" section of the [Qualtrics guide](https://www.qualtrics.com/support/survey-platform/survey-module/question-options/recode-values/)

    -   [ ] Follow the instructions on how to [name and recode values](https://docs.google.com/document/d/15ynxeoIaLhABAAeDLJYV1MwQRwpI8LM24Zd3tOwxcFQ/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.25d8wyh38wre)

## Export Survey Data

-   [ ] Log into Qualtrics: <https://binghamton.co1.qualtrics.com>
    -   [ ] Under Active surveys, click on your survey
-   [ ] At the top, go to Data & Analysis tab (top navigation bar)
    -   [ ] Ensure that "Data" is selected (from the second navigvation bar)

![*Click on Data & Analysis and ensure Data is underlined in the navigation bars.*](images/export-navbar.png)

-   [ ] On the upper right side, click Export & Import \^, then select Export Data...

-   [ ] Download the dataset (with download all fields checked and export *values* check â€“ do not select export *labels* in two file formats:

    -   [ ] CSV

    -   [ ] Excel

-   [ ] Upload both files to "Survey Data" folder in your Team ELN

-   [ ] Rename both files using the date MONTH.DAY.YEAR.filename.team#.filetype. For example, you could use `{r} current_date` in the correct format and update the file names: `{r} current_date`.data.team1.csv and `{r} current_date`.data.team1.xlsx
